name: Spawn of Chernobog
description: The Spawn of Chernobog is a large fiend embodying darkness and infection, with a strong physical presence, featuring a threatening physique and an aura of illness.
memorable: Its ability to infect and transform victims into spawn creates an intense sense of horror and urgency.
goals: To spread its infection and create more spawn, causing chaos and darkness.
relations: May be allied with other fiendish entities or corrupted creatures.
environment: Thrives in dark environments, avoiding sunlight.
strengths: Exceptional melee attacker with high strength and resilience.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and significantly weakened in sunlight.
attacks: Multiattack with a Bite that infects and claws that deal slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Night's Blood, which can transform victims into spawn through a debilitating infection.
skills: Proficient in athletics, showcasing its exceptional physical prowess.
additional_information: Immune to being charmed or frightened.
Can spread a potentially deadly disease that can lead to transformation.
Gains darkvision and sensitivity to sunlight after infection.
Secretes black oil aiding in escape from grapples.
Transforms into a spawn of Chernobog at midnight if not cured.
test_queries: creature that transforms victims into spawn
large fiend with a powerful bite attack
infectious dark monster with sunlight sensitivity
